initial={usage:'none',customer:{id:"",name:"",email:""},event:{id:"-1",code:"",title:"",description:""},registration:{id:"-1",event_id:"-1",customer_id:"-1",registration_date:-1,notes:""}};var formState=function formState(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initial;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var data=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'UPDATE_CUSTOMER_FORM_OBJECT':{var field={};field[action.field_name]=action.field_value;var id=Math.floor(1000*(1+Math.random(Date.now()))).toString();new_customer={customer:{id:id,name:"",email:""}};}return Object.assign({},state,new_customer,usage);}case'UPDATE_EVENT_FORM_OBJECT':{var
